field.name: mapTypeId
field.title: Map Type
field.description: The initial Map mapTypeId. Defaults to ROADMAP

field.name: minZoom
field.title: Min Zoom
field.description: The minimum zoom level which will be displayed on the map. If omitted, or set to null, the minimum zoom from the current map type is used instead.

field.name: maxZoom
field.title: Max Zoom
field.description: The maximum zoom level which will be displayed on the map. If omitted, or set to null, the maximum zoom from the current map type is used instead.

field.name: zoom
field.title: Zoom
field.description: The initial Map zoom level. Required

field.name: zoomControl
field.title: Zoom Control
field.description: The enabled/disabled state of the Zoom control.
